ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (($Profile.Name = 'VC Customer Community Login') || ($Profile.Name = 'VC Investor Community Plus Login')) && (ISCHANGED( Name) || ISCHANGED( Trustee_Name__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To make changes to your already identified name, please reach out to our Customer Support team at investor@venturecrowd.com.au or call 1300 039 655 during business hours. Thank you.
